description:
Dedicated Ohio Injury Attorneys

Located in Cincinnati, Ohio, the law firm of Kisling Nestico & Redick LLC focuses solely on protecting the rights and entitlements of innocent accident victims, as well as employees dealing with work-related illnesses or injuries.

Our Cincinnati law office is one of the 10 we have in the state, and from this location, we serve clients throughout Hamilton County and the surrounding areas of southwestern Ohio who face legal challenges resulting from any of the following:

  • Personal injury and wrongful death claims
  • Work-related illnesses and injuries and workers' compensation
  • Plaintiff victims of car accidents, truck accidents and motorcycle accidents
  • Insurance bad faith
  • Medical malpractice
  • Dangerous medical devices and drugs
  • Toxic exposures, including asbestos-related illnesses
  • Defective products
  • Slip-and-fall accidents and dangerous property conditions

Considerable Experience And Impressive Results

The attorneys at our law firm are committed to providing all of our clients with the personalized assistance and compassionate support they deserve.

With over 400 years of combined legal experience and having recovered over $450 million on behalf of our clients, there is no case beyond our scope.

Due to this high level of customer-focused service, our law firm receives many positive referrals from past clients fully satisfied with the high level of service they received from our attorneys and paralegals.

Discuss Your Case With No Risk

If you suffered an injury or lost a loved one through no fault of your own, you can contact Kisling Nestico & Redick LLC to discuss your legal needs free of charge.
